String.string: The only thing worse than a kulkari is a {@creature:46#201#argonomorph kulkari crusher}.
Kill the {@creature:46#201#argonomorph kulkari crushers} guarding the rooms in the {@Rgn:46003$$Raga Shadi} part of {@Rgn:46001$$the Three Towers}.
"I've had a lot of kulkari practice."
Go to the {@Rgn:46019$$Beastroar Chamber} and report to {@linkcreature:246#1025$$Alecian}.
